Posts.Content:
Hi Euphoria,
I hope you are getting well. I wish the best.
Posts.Title: The time when all therapies are finished

Posts.Content:
Hi Marica,
Welcome to this forum where you will always have the feeling that ur between friends, people giving also their personal fight for a better quality life. Stand up, forget the past and always keep up looking forward !!!!!!!!!!
Posts.Title: The time when all therapies are finished

Posts.Content:
Euphoria,
There is no need for real friends to receive any thanks but their job is to stand by all times and give/receive support whenever needed. 
This is also the target of this forum.
Posts.Title: The time when all therapies are finished
